backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, roles, stores, products, orders, reviews, and terms with authorization helpers and in‑memory storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: JSON feature evidence report describing a requirement to ensure the APK binary is correctly served and installed, listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including routing, hooks, components, pages, and utilities for the PrimePost app.
frontend/.gitattributes: Configures Git to treat APKs and other binary assets as binary to avoid corruption.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore for Android project build outputs, generated files, IDE metadata, and keystores.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android module build script configuring SDK versions, dependencies, asset copying, and build types.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app permissions, main activity, and deep link intent filters.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Empty placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is preserved in Git.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Main Android activity hosting the WebView, handling navigation, deep links, and Internet Identity auth flows.
Helper class deciding when to open URLs externally and handling deep link return logic for auth.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen drawable showing a white background with centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a full‑screen WebView for rendering the embedded web app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon definition similar to the standard one.
Adaptive launcher icon definition with white background and foreground graphic.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines the app name string resource.
Defines the app theme with splash screen and no action bar.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top‑level Gradle build script configuring repositories and plugin versions for the Android project.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle configuration flags including JVM args and AndroidX settings.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies Gradle wrapper distribution settings using Gradle 8.2.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings declaring repositories and including the app module.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Documentation explaining prerequisites and steps for building the PrimePost Android APK.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: Builds the React web app and Android debug APK on Windows, verifies the APK, and copies it to public assets.
Builds the React web app and Android debug APK on Unix systems, validates the APK, and publishes it with metadata.
frontend/scripts/stage-android-apk-asset: Stages the APK and metadata on Windows by validating existing assets or triggering a rebuild, then performs final checks.
Stages the APK and metadata on Unix systems, rebuilding if needed and verifying size, signature, and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root React app, routing structure, and authentication flows including PIN, biometric, and profile setup dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin UI for viewing, editing, and publishing legal documents such as terms and privacy policy, with save and publish actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog for enabling biometric authentication with setup, skip, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Handles creation and confirmation of a 4‑digit PIN using a two‑step dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form dialog for creating a user profile with validation, role handling, and save mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock flow supporting biometric authentication fallback to PIN input with error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with role‑based navigation, header, footer, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides theme context, persists theme selection, and syncs resolved light/dark mode.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
Detects Android WebView and wraps Internet Identity login with Android‑specific error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Manages WebAuthn-based biometric enabling and verification with local credential storage and processing state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login flow, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Implements local PIN hashing, storage, verification, and session unlock state using a reactive store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods like profiles, terms, and admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Contains bundled customer and store‑owner legal documents for PrimePost as static text exports.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
Admin dashboard showing platform stats, store block/unblock controls, and order analytics with daily, weekly, and monthly views.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Role-based login page handling Internet Identity or Android bridge auth and redirecting users to the correct dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Customer cart UI for reviewing items, adjusting quantities, removing products, and navigating to checkout or stores.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Checkout flow allowing table input, notes, payment selection, PIN/biometric auth, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Customer home dashboard offering navigation to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and order history.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Marketplace listing with search, filters, sorting, and add-to-cart functionality for discounted products.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays details for a specific customer order, including items, store info, status, and optional notes, with navigation back to orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Shows a tabbed list of active and completed customer orders with status badges and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Provides a form for entering a store ID and navigating to that store’s page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Loads and displays store info, products, and reviews, allowing customers to add items to cart or navigate back.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Enables searching and filtering stores by name and category, showing matching results with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Allows store owners to manage products, including creating, editing, and deleting items with image uploads and stock controls.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays store orders grouped by status and lets owners update each order's status.
Shows the owner's stores and provides navigation to register stores, manage inventory, view orders, and adjust settings.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Provides a form to register a new store and submit details to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Loads an existing store's data and allows editing and saving updated store information.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Fetches APK metadata, validates the deployed APK, and displays download info or errors.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Loads and displays the privacy policy content with a scrollable view and fallback if unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Renders a terms acceptance page that loads terms content, falls back to bundled text, and submits acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing per‑store carts with add, remove, update, clear, and total‑calculation logic.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In‑tab reactive store tracking whether a PIN is set and whether the session is unlocked, syncing with local and session storage.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides helpers to aggregate orders into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue and count statistics.
frontend/src/utils/apkIntegrity.ts: Fetches and validates APK metadata and binary integrity, checking size, content type, and ZIP header.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices and computing discounted and line‑item totals using bigint.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and hash routes.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates display names and initials from a user profile with simple fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: Provides WebAuthn availability checks and wrappers for creating and retrieving platform authenticator credentials.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning, extended colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the PrimePost multi‑vendor POS platform.
